original_title: Kenny Chesney: Road Case - The Movie
overview: Road Case, "The Movie" is an inside look at what would prove to be one of the hottest tours of 2003. Film crews lived alongside Kenny, his band, and tour support while on the road with "Margaritas & Senoritas." The result is a compelling story of life on the road with an artist, his friends, and the dreams that would come true.
title: Kenny Chesney: Road Case - The Movie
